story.title: CPS Public Hearing: Brian Piccolo Elementary AUSL Turnaround
story.description: A hearing for the proposed Reconstitution/Turnaround of Brian Piccolo Elementary Specialty School. The turnaround would be run by AUSL (Academy for Urban School Leadership). Held in the board room of the Chicago Public Schools administration building. Monday, January 30th, 2012 8:00 - 10:00 PM

author.name: Josh Kalov
author.bio: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related. Iâ€™m moving my stories to Wakelet https://wakelet.com/@joshkalov

quote.text: Stay tuned to @cncschools for live tweets from the Piccolo hearing starting at 8 p.m.

meta.text: Stay tuned to @cncschools for live tweets from the Piccolo hearing starting at 8 p.m.

quote.text: 2 minutes until start of 2nd hearing. Stuck in security line.

meta.text: 2 minutes until start of 2nd hearing. Stuck in security line.

quote.text: This is the hearing for the turnaround / reconstitution of Piccolo #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: This is the hearing for the turnaround / reconstitution of Piccolo #cps

quote.text: Chief Portfolio Officer Oliver Sicat is testifying in favor of Piccolo turnaround. #cps

meta.text: Chief Portfolio Officer Oliver Sicat is testifying in favor of Piccolo turnaround. #cps

quote.text: Oliver Sicat speaking in support. Highest official I've seen speak so far I believe. #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Oliver Sicat speaking in support. Highest official I've seen speak so far I believe. #cps

quote.text: Howe principal Campbell will speak about AUSL successes, Sicat says. She spoke at last hearing. #cps

meta.text: Howe principal Campbell will speak about AUSL successes, Sicat says. She spoke at last hearing. #cps

quote.text: Data strategist from the Garfield-Humboldt network will present Piccolo data. #cps

meta.text: Data strategist from the Garfield-Humboldt network will present Piccolo data. #cps

quote.text: Mr. Thomas (Data strategist) is the 2nd to speak for CEO #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Mr. Thomas (Data strategist) is the 2nd to speak for CEO #cps

quote.text: @sethlavin They speak as representatives of the CEO. "The CEO has asked me to appear today..."

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: @sethlavin They speak as representatives of the CEO. "The CEO has asked me to appear today..."

quote.text: Last year, Piccolo earned 19% of possible points under the district's performance policy. #cps

meta.text: Last year, Piccolo earned 19% of possible points under the district's performance policy. #cps

quote.text: Piccolo has been on probation for the past 5 consecutive school years. The past four years of data are being submitted. #cps

meta.text: Piccolo has been on probation for the past 5 consecutive school years. The past four years of data are being submitted. #cps

quote.text: Last year, 50.6% of Piccolo students met or exceeded state standards, below network average - 69.7% and district average - 75.%

meta.text: Last year, 50.6% of Piccolo students met or exceeded state standards, below network average - 69.7% and district average - 75.%

quote.text: Last year 2.2% of students exceeded state standards at Piccolo, below network average - 11.3% and district - 18.1%. #cps

meta.text: Last year 2.2% of students exceeded state standards at Piccolo, below network average - 11.3% and district - 18.1%. #cps

quote.text: @cncschools @shua123 that performance policy merits a close look. Some Schools with good performance got placed on probation due to that pp.

meta.text: @cncschools @shua123 that performance policy merits a close look. Some Schools with good performance got placed on probation due to that pp.

quote.text: Who are these presentations really for? The hearing officer? The public? The public record? Has to be better way to do this. #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Who are these presentations really for? The hearing officer? The public? The public record? Has to be better way to do this. #cps

quote.text: District officials say "exceeds" numbers are a better indicator of college and career readiness and closer to the Common Core standards.

meta.text: District officials say "exceeds" numbers are a better indicator of college and career readiness and closer to the Common Core standards.

quote.text: Correction: NOT negative growth... but rather slower growth than schools in the rest of the district. #cps

meta.text: Correction: NOT negative growth... but rather slower growth than schools in the rest of the district. #cps

quote.text: Piccolo has been on probation for 14 of the last 16 years, says network chief. #cps

meta.text: Piccolo has been on probation for 14 of the last 16 years, says network chief. #cps

quote.text: CPS and CTU partnered to make Piccolo a "fresh start" school, network chief says. #cps

meta.text: CPS and CTU partnered to make Piccolo a "fresh start" school, network chief says. #cps

quote.text: Network chief's statement eerily similar to Casals testimony. "There's an urgent need to improve performance at Piccolo." #cps

meta.text: Network chief's statement eerily similar to Casals testimony. "There's an urgent need to improve performance at Piccolo." #cps

quote.text: AUSL-run Howe principal, Keisha Campbell, delivers same presentation for Piccolo that she did for Casals. #cps

meta.text: AUSL-run Howe principal, Keisha Campbell, delivers same presentation for Piccolo that she did for Casals. #cps

quote.text: Piccolo's ISAT scores are lower than all of the 10 AUSL-run schools on Campbell's presentation. #cps

meta.text: Piccolo's ISAT scores are lower than all of the 10 AUSL-run schools on Campbell's presentation. #cps

quote.text: If @chipubschools wants people to get on board with data-driven decision making, they need to speak about #s with more context. #cps

user.description: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: If @chipubschools wants people to get on board with data-driven decision making, they need to speak about #s with more context. #cps

quote.text: Lots of data tonight showing what's wrong with schools. Not much data showing why purposed solution (turnaround) is best. #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Lots of data tonight showing what's wrong with schools. Not much data showing why purposed solution (turnaround) is best. #cps

quote.text: I guess this AUSL data segment by Keisha Campbell would be data in support of turnaround, but still only is data on 1 option. #cps

meta.text: I guess this AUSL data segment by Keisha Campbell would be data in support of turnaround, but still only is data on 1 option. #cps

quote.text: 8:43pm and the CEO portion is finished. #cps

meta.text: 8:43pm and the CEO portion is finished. #cps

quote.text: @shua123 @mifarmer A great way to winnow out administrators unable to instantly solve society's problems as distilled in an urban fishbowl

meta.text: @shua123 @mifarmer A great way to winnow out administrators unable to instantly solve society's problems as distilled in an urban fishbowl

quote.text: LSC chair Latrice Watkins testifies against turnaround. In July, we just got appointed a new principal. #cps

meta.text: LSC chair Latrice Watkins testifies against turnaround. In July, we just got appointed a new principal. #cps

quote.text: Piccolo also recently got a new principal. Both schools tonight have principals in their 1st year at the school #cps

meta.text: Piccolo also recently got a new principal. Both schools tonight have principals in their 1st year at the school #cps

quote.text: I'm no project manager, but it sure seems inefficient to install new school administrations & then decide to turnaround 4 months later #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: I'm no project manager, but it sure seems inefficient to install new school administrations & then decide to turnaround 4 months later #cps

quote.text: Watkins: Attendance rate is 92%, almost to goal of 95%.

meta.text: Watkins: Attendance rate is 92%, almost to goal of 95%.

quote.text: Piccolo 1st grade teacher who started the day after turnaround was announced said her students "had a month and a half of subs.â€ #cps

meta.text: Teacher notes problems at AUSL-run Orr High School and high number of dropouts. #cps

quote.text: Clapping. Hearing officer again tells people to stop. "If we expect our children to abide by the rules, we need to follow them." #cps

quote.text: Piccolo teacher: school has had 3 administrations in 5 years. "Our new principal holds a strong presence at our school.â€ #cps
